title: Vec2Vec: A Compact Neural Network Approach for Transforming Text Embeddings with High Fidelity. (arXiv:2306.12689v1 [cs.CL])
abstract: Vector embeddings have become ubiquitous tools for many language-related tasks. A leading embedding model is OpenAI's text-ada-002 which can embed approximately 6,000 words into a 1,536-dimensional vector. While powerful, text-ada-002 is not open source and is only available via API. We trained a simple neural network to convert open-source 768-dimensional MPNet embeddings into text-ada-002 embeddings. We compiled a subset of 50,000 online food reviews. We calculated MPNet and text-ada-002 embeddings for each review and trained a simple neural network to for 75 epochs. The neural network was designed to predict the corresponding text-ada-002 embedding for a given MPNET embedding. Our model achieved an average cosine similarity of 0.932 on 10,000 unseen reviews in our held-out test dataset. We manually assessed the quality of our predicted embeddings for vector search over text-ada-002-embedded reviews. While not as good as real text-ada-002 embeddings, predicted embeddings were able to

Title: Vec2Vec: A Compact Neural Network Approach for Transforming Text Embeddings with High Fidelity. (arXiv:2306.12689v1 [cs.CL])
Abstract: Vector embeddings have become ubiquitous tools for many language-related tasks. A leading embedding model is OpenAI's text-ada-002 which can embed approximately 6,000 words into a 1,536-dimensional vector. While powerful, text-ada-002 is not open source and is only available via API. We trained a simple neural network to convert open-source 768-dimensional MPNet embeddings into text-ada-002 embeddings. We compiled a subset of 50,000 online food reviews. We calculated MPNet and text-ada-002 embeddings for each review and trained a simple neural network to for 75 epochs. The neural network was designed to predict the corresponding text-ada-002 embedding for a given MPNET embedding. Our model achieved an average cosine similarity of 0.932 on 10,000 unseen reviews in our held-out test dataset. We manually assessed the quality of our predicted embeddings for vector search over text-ada-002-embedded reviews. While not as good as real text-ada-002 embeddings, predicted embeddings were able to
translated_abstract: 向量嵌入已成为许多语言相关任务的通用工具。OpenAI的text-ada-002是一种领先的嵌入模型，它可以将大约6,000个词嵌入到1,536维向量中。虽然功能强大，但text-ada-002不是开源的，只能通过API来使用。我们训练了一个简单的神经网络，将开源的768维MPNet嵌入转换为text-ada-002嵌入。我们编译了一个由50,000个在线食品评论组成的子集。我们为每个评论计算了MPNet和text-ada-002嵌入，并训练了一个简单的神经网络进行了75个时期的训练。该神经网络旨在预测给定MPNet嵌入的相应text-ada-002嵌入。我们的模型在我们的保留测试数据集中的10,000个未见过的评论上实现了0.932的平均余弦相似度。我们手动评估了我们预测的嵌入质量，用于text-ada-002嵌入式评论的向量搜索。虽然不及真正的text-ada-002嵌入好，预测嵌入仍然能够
tldr: 该论文介绍了一种使用简单的神经网络将开源的768维MPNet嵌入转换为text-ada-002嵌入的方法，并实现了较高的余弦相似度。这种方法具有通用性，并可用于许多自然语言处理任务。
en_tdlr: This paper presents a method of using a simple neural network to transform open-source 768-dimensional MPNet embeddings into text-ada-002 embeddings with high cosine similarity. The method is generalizable and can be applied to many natural language processing tasks.
